alert.note: Alert for Merced (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 12 at 6:34PM PDT until March 12 at 7:45PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central California, including the following county, Merced. * WHEN...Until 945 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 634 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Los Banos, San Luis Dam, San Luis Reservoir and San Luis National Wildlife Refuge. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
